modName: Categorized Favorites Menu - Mighty Magick for mages
summary: Support for Mighty Magick in the Favorites Menu, dumping everything that isn't magic/shout into the Others so you'll have more room to choose from your plenthora of magic.
descriptionHtml:
Just backup your favoritesmenu.cfg and replace it with the downloaded.

This will change the menus to categorize all magic in separated rows. You'll also have a Shouts/Powers row and the Others row.
Modify it as you wish.

Thanks Damar Stiehl for Mighty Magick and favmenumodder for Categorized Favorites Menu.
author: LordSett
